movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Conjuring
movies.description: Paranormal investigators work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

movies.title: A Quiet Place
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

movies.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
movies.description: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce.

movies.title: The Hangover
movies.description: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook.

movies.title: Rocky
movies.description: A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight a heavyweight champion in a bout.

movies.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
movies.description: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

movies.title: Planet Earth II
movies.description: David Attenborough returns with a new wildlife documentary that shows life in a variety of habitats.

movies.title: Our Planet
movies.description: Documentary series focusing on the breadth of the diversity of habitats around the world.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

movies.title: Toy Story
movies.description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

movies.title: Finding Nemo
movies.description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated cannibal killer to catch another serial killer.

movies.title: Superbad
movies.description: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world.

movies.title: The Notebook
movies.description: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland.

movies.title: Hereditary
movies.description: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences after the death of their secretive grandmother.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.description: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy.
